column1: Smoque BBQ////We hired Smoque to do catering at Emporium Logan Square for our wedding reception.  They asked all the right questions
column2: came out and did a walk through
column4: and had great communication.  Peggy and Mike met got all of the details set up for me and Mike came the day of with a few other servers.  They set up and broke everything down.  They were so accommodating and made it so I didn't worry at all.  My guests LOVED the food (we all did!) and we had many guests go for 2nd and 3rds.  I would hire them again in a heartbeat.  The price was GREAT
column6: and the experience was the BEST.
